newsitem.title: USA: Imnet Systems sees Q3 oper shr $0.21-$0.23.
newsitem.headline: Imnet Systems sees Q3 oper shr $0.21-$0.23.

text.p: IMNET Systems Inc said on Monday that it expects revenues of $13.6 million and earnings per share before charges of $0.21 to $0.23 for the third quarter ended March 31, 1997.
Operating results improved from last year's third quarter when it reported revenues of $7.0 million and earnings per share of $0.04, IMNET said.
First Call reported that the company is expected to earn about $0.20 a share, according to a consensus of securities analysts expectations.
IMNET said it will take a charge of $1.8 million related to the writedown of its MedVision product line and relocation costs.
Financial results for the third quarter will be reported after the market closes April 23, IMNET said.

In last year's third quarter, the company reported a charge of $4.6 million that resulted in a net loss of $0.50 a shre, or $4.3 million. Before the charge, the company reported the tax adjusted earnings per share of $0.04.
